name: Orphanage Escape
description:
Orphanage Escape

A Game by:   

PIXOVER

David Curral

Miguel Marcelino

Miguel Freire

Our game is a prototype for college, and is a vertical slice. At the moment we want to test it.

Gameplay:

This game is a Top-Down explorer with some puzzles incorporated. In it you help Lucy, a little girl who lived all of her life in this orphanage, to escape. Being a prototype it is not a very big game, nonetheless we hope you have fun.

Controls:

Movement - Arrows     

Interactions -  Z (letter) or J

We would appreciate if you could fill the form.

Thank you for playing :)
